posts.description: I don't know what to say other than... go to Wales, you'll love it! 😍 There's so much colour, nature and history packed into that one little country that I'm not even sure it's fair 😂 ••• TELL ME: What's YOUR favourite destination that's a little off the beaten path? 🌍❤

Wales is picture perfect - beaches, castles and stunning nature everywhere 😍 I'm so glad I was able to spend the weekend here! I've still got tomorrow morning left to explore Tenby, but then I'm off to London for a week 🇬🇧 Ladies if you're free next Thursday, April 27th, don't forget to check out the meetup I'm organising there {link in bio} - I'm so excited about it! 🤓🎉 ••• TELL ME: Where are YOU travelling to next? I can't wait to announce my next trip soon!

Surprise, I'm in WALES! 🇬🇧 I'll be exploring the beautiful county of Pembrokeshire over the next two days and I'm super excited about it. I started off on a high note by finding this beach that wouldn't look out of place in the Caribbean 🌊 Not sure I'm going to be able to top that... Oh wait, just kidding! I'm going to Skomer Island tomorrow to hang out with puffins! 🐧❤ Don't forget to tune into my stories this weekend because I'll be sharing a lot of behind-the-scenes shots from my trip, organised with the kind help of @Laterooms & #LateRoomsAdventures ☺ ••• TELL ME: Have you ever been to Wales? Would you like to visit? Any tips on what I should see/do while I'm here? 🌼 ••• PS: I'm organising a female traveller meet up in London next Thursday, April 27th and would love to see you there. The link is in my bio so check it out - I'd love to hang out with you in person 🤓

How beautiful is this light? There's really something about England in the sunshine that makes my heart skip a beat! 😍❤ ••• TELL ME: What's your favourite place in the UK? Any towns you'd like me to visit and write about? 🇬🇧 ••• 📷 @peterparkorr

What's the best view you've ever had from a hotel window? 😍 This one in Sóller, Mallorca was pretty damn spectacular... and the room cost €27 per night 😱 Just goes to show that travel doesn't have to cost a fortune!

I'm back in the UK, celebrating Easter with my boyfriend's family! 🐣🌷 Are you celebrating? What are YOUR plans or local traditions? Whatever you do I hope you have a wonderful weekend. I'll be in the UK till the end of the month and can't wait to share more of my travels around the country with you 😘 I'm going to Wales next weekend and I'm SO excited about it! 🇬🇧 ••• 📷 @peterparkorr

What's more beautiful than nature in bloom? 🌸 Sometimes I wish spring lasted all year, but I quickly snap out of it. There's so much beauty in diversity! I love all four seasons and seeing them transform the world around me just makes me appreciate the whole cycle of life more. That's how I feel about all of humanity. We should embrace our differences and use them to bring us together rather than divide us. Here's to a world that tolerates, no, *celebrates* diversity! 🌍 ••• TELL ME: Do you have a favourite season? After living in Scotland, England and Russia I've really come to appreciate sunshine, but I was born in October so I'll always be a fall baby at heart 🍁🍂

The way you look at the world changes everything 👀 If you're seeing everything around you through a lens of fear and mistrust that's exactly what you'll find. But if you choose to focus on the good and find beauty where most people don't notice it, your life will quickly improve! 💕 All this is not to say that being positive is easy. Oftentimes it's not. But it's definitely worth it! ••• TELL ME: How do you stay positive in a world so full of hate? Earlier today I watched a video of an older man being violently dragged off a flight he'd paid for - I'm sure you've seen it too by now. It broke my heart to see a human being treated so poorly! What do you do in those moments to remind yourself that *most* people are kind? 💔🕊

Much like Barcelona has Antoni Gaudí, Vienna's architecture was shaped by another architectural mastermind - Friedensreich Regentag Dunkelbunt Hundertwasser. No, I’ve not just put an ancient Germanic curse on you, that's really his name 😂❤ Hundertwasser's houses are full of vibrant colours, innovative textures and lush greenery. I love how he managed to incorporate nature into his designs! What do you think about his style? It's definitely out there but I'm a fan 🤓 ••• TELL ME: Do you have a favourite architect or beautiful building? 🏛

We need to talk! I love Instagramming my travels but I've been feeling a little discouraged lately... 🙈 Not because of how many likes or followers I have or anything like that. I'm grateful for every single one of you and don't take your support for granted! ❤ I'm feeling discouraged because I see a lot of half truths on social media. As photographers we want to make the world around us look beautiful, but how much is *too* much? Is it ok to edit the colour of the sky? How about the colour of your eyes? What about removing people from your image and making it look like you were the only person there? 🤷‍♀️ I don't have the answers but think this is a conversation we need to have. Take this photo for example... I've photoshopped two images together, but would you know that if I didn't tell you? Probably not because we take what we see on social media for granted, despite knowing that a lot of manipulation goes on behind the scenes. How much can we *really* trust the travel photos we see on @instagram? I'd LOVE to hear your take on this - please join the debate and share your opinion! 🤓
